SS:  The point is I'm trying to start an army of Darkness.  I plan to 
gain control of your faction in this manner over time.  You could be 
the first under my command, but your brothers couldn't dream of the 
power you'd have (if the council is getting mad tell me and we can 
ignore the last few posts last chance).

> lUZBEL::
>
